concept.title: Diagram: Typical IDD_RUN operating behavior
concept.shortdesc: The following data was measured under these conditions:

ul.li: MCG in FBE mode for 50 MHz and lower frequencies. MCG in FEE mode at frequencies between 50 MHz and 100MHz.
Code execution from flash with cache enabled
For the ALLOFF curve, all peripheral clocks are disabled except FTFA
